subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: One day after it lost to Navy for the 12th consecutive time, Army fired its football coach, Rich Ellerson, who went 20-41 in five seasons, including 1-9 against the other service academies.
snippet: One day after it lost to Navy for the 12th consecutive time, Army fired its football coach, Rich Ellerson, who went 20-41 in five seasons, including 1-9 against the other service academies.
